name: Off the Rails (itch) (Benjouille, Lara Ploix, LeandreRenouard, DonnieDarko)
name_original: Off the Rails (itch) (Benjouille, Lara Ploix, LeandreRenouard, DonnieDarko)
description:
In Off The Rails,  you play as an urbexer exploring an abandoned train factory. As you take pictures of your surroundings, you will discover some ancient items full of memories. With the help of your magic camera, you will unveil the daily life of workers in the 19th century, as well as a family secret buried in the ruins of the factory...

This is a first prototype for a proof of concept of the game, after 3 months of work. Many assets are placeholders and gameplay mechanics will be adjusted.

Made with UnrealEngine4.

Feel free to give us feedbacks !

/!\ Sorry only AZERTY or Gamepad controls for now, update on this soon.
Also working on English subtitles. 

Controls : Xbox Gamepad : 

Joystick Left  : Moving
Joystick Right : Looking
A : Action
B : Crouch
Y : Camera Mode
X  : Open album

In Mode photo :
RT LT : Zoom In/Out
LB - Take photo

In Album :
D-Pad : Chose Photo

Mouse + Keyboard : 

ZQSD  : Moving
Mouse : Looking
Space : Action
X: Crouch
RightClick : Camera Mode
M  : Open album

In Mode photo :
Scrool : Zoom In/Out
LeftClick - Take picture

In Album :
A/E : Chose picture
